diff_act: 3.determine the best placement for the job

regen.absent_element: consideration of job requirements and node availability in determining the best placement for the job
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall consider the job requirements and node availability when determining the best host and queue for job execution.

label: After the host is determined, the Libra shall select the appropriate queue based on the job parameter.
absence: the selection of the appropriate queue after the host is determined
